replies.body:
Math Armor
Wearing this armor will make you automatically spam infinite digits of pi in chat. This would anger and confuse your enemies and make you win 100% of your fights.
Also, since this is math armor and EVERYONE loves math you will be loved by all too when wearing this armor. By being in this math you will make everyone do what you say; they will be your slaves. You would be the master of Minecraft, then eventually the world.
The true power of math would be revealed by wearing this armor.
